sqlMap.select: SELECT A.ISAUTH, A.FID, A.FNAME, A.LATITUDE, A.LONGITUDE, A.NLDNO, A.MOBILE, A.PHONE1, A.IMAGEHOST, A.FILENAME, A.CATEGORY, A.REMARK, A.EMAIL, A.CLOSEDDAY, A.OPENDAY, A.WEBSITE, A.INFO, A.QRCODE, A.SAVEDATE, A.EDITDATE, S.BASNAME AS SERVICETYPE, P.BASNAME AS PLACETYPE, A.FULLADDRESS, A.SIDO, A.GUGUN, A.DONG, A.NEWADDRESS, A.PAYINFO, A.PARKINFO, A.BLDINFO FROM PLACE A LEFT OUTER JOIN PBASCD S ON A.SERVICETYPE = S.BASECD AND S.GRPCD = 'SERVICETYPE' LEFT OUTER JOIN PBASCD P ON A.PLACETYPE = P.BASECD AND P.GRPCD = 'PLACETYPE' WHERE FID = #fid# AND A.ISAUTH ='Y'

SELECT sql_calc_found_rows A.FID, C.COMMENT, E.NAME, E.PROFILEIMAGEURL, C.EMAIL, C.SAVEDATE, C.CID FROM PLACE A LEFT OUTER JOIN PLACECOMMENT C ON A.FID = C.FID LEFT OUTER JOIN PUSER E ON E.EMAIL = C.EMAIL WHERE A.FID = #fid# AND C.ISDELETE = 'N' ORDER BY C.SAVEDATE DESC LIMIT #startRow# , #endRow#
SELECT sql_calc_found_rows A.EID, A.TITLE, A.CONTENT, A.ISAUTH, A.STARTDATE, A.ENDDATE, A.EDITDATE, FROM PLACEEVENT A WHERE A.ISDELETE = 'N' AND A.ISAUTH = 'Y' AND A.FID = #fid# ORDER BY A.EID DESC

SELECT B.EMAIL, B.SAVEDATE,e.PROFILEIMAGEURL FROM PLACESTAMP A INNER JOIN PSTAMP B ON A.STAMPID = B.STAMPID INNER JOIN PSTAMPTYPE C ON A.SID = C.SID INNER JOIN PLACE D ON A.FID = D.FID WHERE A.FID = #fid# AND B.STATUS <> 'C' ORDER BY B.SAVEDATE desc LIMIT 1, 10
SELECT TITLE, CONTENT, PRICE, ISSALE, SALEPRICE FROM PLACEMENU WHERE FID = #fid#
SELECT TITLE, CONTENT, SITEURL, FILEPATH FROM PLACEREVIEW WHERE FID = #fid#
SELECT FID, MTITLE, MURL, MTYPE, SIZE, ISDELETE, SAVEDATE, EMAIL,DISPSEQ, HOST FROM PLACEMEDIA WHERE FID = #fid#
